examples.example: 我买了一注彩票，期待着能收获一份惊喜。

translate.english: I bought a lottery ticket and was looking forward to reaping a pleasant surprise.

examples.example: 我投了一注对未来的美好期望，相信努力后定能收获满满。

translate.english: I have placed a bet on the beautiful expectation of the future, believing that after hard work, there will surely be a bountiful harvest.

examples.example: 我在心田里种下一注希望的种子，期待它能茁壮成长，绽放美丽的花朵。

translate.english: I planted a seed of hope in my heart field, expecting it to thrive and blossom beautiful flowers.
